channel.title: ExiliumV2 Final Release || All skills || POS || Points+Shops || Titles ||20+Boss
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz246/deamonchubby/Exilium/exillogo.png[/img] Here's another version of Exilium(worked on it since version 1)
Source started with a blank pi/dspk
What was done in v1: -Fixed bank all lag -Added slayer points, level points and donator points w/ shops. -Added 99 anouncements & rewards -Added moneypouch & fixed dupe -Fixed all dupes known to PI including cheat engine -Fixed applyDead error -Added better woodcutting -Added better Fishing -Added better Crafting -Added Bonfires -Added Construction -Added 721 skill interface -Added custom NPC that holds most beginner shops -Added playerTitles including commands for them -Added 10+ more bosses -Added shitty zombie minigame -Added shop to duradel -Added extreme slayer tasks -Added donators dungeon -Many useful/unusful customs -Added ectophial minigame -Fixed "free quests" within quest tab -Added custom login screen -Added timed mute -Compressed all models to one file -Drop dupe taken care of -Lottery(Lottie) -662 Character models -660 model header -Login-Annoucements -2 starters per ip -Smithing (all) -Arrow dupe fixed -Fixed pm and chat crowns -added TabToReply -Use(All)Bones on altar -DragonTokens(1m gp) -No random lines on spirit shields and ghostly -Single doors -Double doors -Added FunPK -Fixed korasi spec -Hand cannon started -Player Owned Shops -721 Emotes tab
What was done in v2: -NPC facing -Half way finished with theiving -Removed money pouch(Rendered useless to me) -Added EXP drop(when xp orb is clicked) -Nex added -New teleport interfaces(ripped from an old delta i use to play) -Many new interfaces overall -Smoother rendering -Smoother color definition -Half way done drops to match new economy -Control panel -Auto-Updating cache -Fixed a few minor bugs in slayer system -New donator chat symbol(Rofl) -New home -Completely coded penguin BOSS(for shits and giggles)[goodluck finding too] -Re added donators dungeon
Media: Robgob's control panel: [IMG]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz246/deamonchubby/ExilReleaseV2/2013-03-04_2227_zps4a6d9a97.png[/img]
Loading bar created with paint: [IMG]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz246/deamonchubby/ExilReleaseV2/2013-03-04_2222_zpsc0541d71.png[/img]
Loading screen created with paint: [IMG]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz246/deamonchubby/ExilReleaseV2/2013-03-04_2223_zpsf9bd18ca.png[/img]
New home: [IMG]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz246/deamonchubby/ExilReleaseV2/2013-03-04_2224_zps4d73751d.png[/img]
NPC facing: [IMG]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz246/deamonchubby/ExilReleaseV2/2013-03-04_2225_zps98a251b4.png[/img]
EXP raising: [IMG]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz246/deamonchubby/ExilReleaseV2/2013-03-04_2228_zps589fe52d.png[/img]
Nex: [IMG]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz246/deamonchubby/ExilReleaseV2/2013-03-04_2229_zps8870d48d.png[/img]
Donators Dungeon: [IMG]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz246/deamonchubby/ExilReleaseV2/2013-03-04_2233_zpsb749255a.png[/img]
New donators chat symbol: [IMG]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz246/deamonchubby/ExilReleaseV2/2013-03-04_2234_zps67e97d7e.png[/img]
Teleport interfaces: [IMG]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz246/deamonchubby/ExilReleaseV2/2013-03-04_2303_zpsa33742e1.png[/img]
Links:
Client- http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?6tt6i8yctiterkw
Source- http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?fj38k3l68jun1e2
Cache- http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ewa70nwimt5vgt9
Credits: Me - Adding most skills and features PI/DSPK - for the source to start with Guides - for most of the skills other than wc, fm and fish. Michael - Helping me along the way(Most npcs) Robgob - Control panel RuneScape - Making all of this possible
Note: Will probably be my last.

item.title: ExiliumV2 Final Release || All skills || POS || Points+Shops || Titles ||20+Boss
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

[quote=“Driman Rune, post:34, topic:505965”]This is his final release because he finally realized PI servers always end up the same, and they are boring and horrible.

2/10

Funny how you say Trisidia is leeched but, all you added i googled it and theirs the tuts for everything you added, so this server is badly leeched too.[/quote]

you sound like a dumb ass, For a v2 this is really good but i also dont see u post any servers? Also you google and found a tut for everything he added but that doesnt mean he used it to prove it, find the tut and then follow that tut and see if the codes line up. I did do that and this isn’t all tut thier are some but most of this he did or may have edited it.

8/10 for being a v2 nice job

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

Driman Rune:

iBunnie i am not going to spoonfeed you, almost everything i what i mean’t to post, and plus all the things you added in this release takes 40 minutes top.

Trust me bud. You wont be the one spoon feeding. I’m spoonfeeding you by even talking to you. You obviously are new to rsps and have played some advanced shit. By the way, this was my SECOND release that i ever had. I clap at how hard you’re trying to down me but it’s not working in the long run. Get a life, don’t download it.

Read full topic
